He goes for her bag.  But she stops him.  A half beat.
Thank you, that's generous, but I
think I should stay here.  With my
brother.  Until we get a handle on
this.
Victor is not used to being rebuffed.  He gives a thin smile.
Sue.  I think you should let my
doctors have a look at you.
A tense beat.  Standoff.  Made more tense by --
They turn to see Reed approaching, with files in hand.

character.name: Victor!  What are you doing here?

dialogue.text: They turn to see Reed approaching, with files in hand.

segments.content: I'm starting to wonder the same
thing... How much do you know about
what happened to you?
Not much.  We need to run tests to see
the extent of the damage.
Victor pauses.  He looks at Sue, knowing she's here to stay.
Well, let me know if there is anything
I can do.  We're all in this together
now.
Victor shakes Reed's hand.  His GRIP is so tight that Reed's
fingers STRETCH.  Victor lets go, and turns to Sue, who puts
her hand out.  He smiles, and shakes.  He heads off.
Reed looks at his hand.  Shakes his wrist.  He looks at
Victor.

Victor moves fast, holds tight to his anger.  Reed catches

               up.
Victor wait... I just wanted to say,
I'm sorry the mission didn't go as
planned --
Victor suddenly WHEELS on Reed.  Lights flicker.
Didn't go as planned?  It was a
catastrophe.  You ruined the lives of
four people --
I ruined?  With all due respect, I
told you to abort --
Abort?  Reed, I put my company, my
name, billions of dollars on the line,
and I will not let you make me look
like a fool --
Victor, if we could understand what
happened to us --
I don't want to understand it.  This
isn't one of your science projects.  I
just want to fix it.  Fast!
Reed sees Victor's SCAR maybe growing.  Lights dim.
They turn to see...BEN down the hall, leaning in a doorway. Victor tightens, looking at Ben's massive rock-hewn body.

segments.content: Just pay your goddamn electric bill,
and get to work on a cure.
Victor steps away, toward the elevator.  He passes Ben, who
just smiles and waves "goodbye."  Before Victor's finger taps
the down-button, the button lights up (as if the circuit
responded to him).  Reed exhales, shaken.  Victor steps into --

The doors close, and Victor really LETS LOOSE.  He SLAMS his

               fist into a STEEL WALL.  The wall BUCKLES, steel DENTING.

               Victor shakes out his hand, and sees...a rippling METALLIC

               SHELL under the skin.  He stares at it in horror.  The dark

               surface pulsates with electric energy.  What is he

               becoming...?

Sue works the controls.  Reed approaches Ben with an

               ELECTRODE NEEDLE.  He tries to stick the needle into Ben, but

               it SNAPS.
You got a chisel round here?
If we're going to identify the source
of the mutation, we need to isolate
your recombinant DNA so we can
activate positional genomes.
Ben looks to Sue for translation.
We need to give you a physical, so we
know what got zapped.
Well why didn't you say so?  You want
me to lift some weights or something?
Reed shakes his head.  He approaches with an X-RAY MACHINE.
No, just sit back.  We have a good
sense of your strength from the
firetruck.  We need to find the source
of your strength.
He turns on the X-ray machine.  The graph shows SOLID ROCK.
The rays don't penetrate.  Sue and Reed look confused.
How bad is it?  You know I used to
smoke.
Reed grabs a BLOOD PRESSURE MACHINE, but the strap is way too
short to wrap around Ben's arm.  Reed stands stumped.  He
looks at his tray full of instruments.  He picks up the
little rubber REFLEX-HAMMER.  But it looks miniscule compared
to Ben.
Reed has an idea.  He opens a drawer full of HARDWARE TOOLS.
He pulls of a real HAMMER.  He approaches Ben.
He taps Ben's knee lightly, and BEN'S LEG KICKS!  SLAMMING UP!  RIGHT BETWEEN REED'S LEGS!  The ultimate kick in the crotch.  Reed STRETCHES UP a few feet, then SNAPS BACK, wincing.

He looks down, excited, burning hotter and hotter.

Sweet.

stretched up your --
INT. BAXTER BUILDING - LAB - DAY Reed and Johnny now.  Johnny exercises.  Reed stands nearby. Clipboard in hand.

About flaming, that you --
What are you trying to say?  Just
because I dress well and like to dance --
(confused)
What?  No.  I'm trying to figure out

symptoms.
Oh, well that's easy: I'm hot.
You're...well, you're a little limp.
Sue's easy to see through.  And Ben's

(a beat)

He "sees" her through the device: lit up like some heavenly creature.  He's having a hard time concentrating.  He focuses on his work.

character.name: Why aren't you writing this down?

He "sees" her through the device: lit up like some heavenly creature.  He's having a hard time concentrating.  He focuses on his work.

You're bending the light around you
with some kind of malleable force
field.  That's what you projected on
the Bridge.
What about you?  You haven't eaten in
days.  How come you're never on this

He tightens, uncomfortable with being center of attention.
She reaches for his arm, like a specimen.  He pulls away, but
she sees a glimpse of BRUISES on his ARMS.  She slows down.
He nods, rolls down his sleeves.

dialogue.text: He nods, rolls down his sleeves.

segments.content: Have you had any side-effects, from
your powers?
She considers.  A little vulnerable.
A beat.  Reed drops his eyes, makes a note, back to work.

dialogue.text: A beat.  Reed drops his eyes, makes a note, back to work.

segments.content: You should be able to bend light
around other objects, even people, if
you could control your emotional state
better --
She is annoyed.  Reed is oblivious.

dialogue.text: She is annoyed.  Reed is oblivious.

segments.content: I'm saying, if you had a little more
self control, you could locate the
trigger.  Can you remember the exact
emotions when --
Anger.  Rage.  Frustration.
Okay.  Is there any way to duplicate
that feeling?  Some memory or...
(staring right at him)

She looks at Reed, eyes narrow.  She becomes invisible.  As she focuses on Reed -- and gets angry -- a small, clear FORCE FIELD forms around her body.  The force-field BENDS LIGHT around a MICROSCOPE, which goes INVISIBLE.  Reed steps out to ask...

character.name: I'm sure I can come up with something.

do that... You must think that was
some kind of latent hostility or --
What in the world would give me that
idea?
An awkward beat.
I mean, you broke up with me, right?
Are you kidding?
No, I distinctly remember: you walked
out my door.  Ergo...
She didn't want to get into this.  She looks down,
vulnerable.
Reed.  I was ready for the next step,
you weren't, ergo, I walked.
I think it was a little more
complicated than --
I just wanted to share an apartment.
The question stumps him.  A beat.  He struggles.

dialogue.text: The question stumps him.  A beat.  He struggles.

segments.content: There were a lot of variables to
consider --
No.  There weren't.  There was you.
And me.  No variables, no math.  It
was actually the simplest thing in the
world.  But your head got in the way...
like it always does.
Her words penetrate.  He knows she's right.  He looks away.
He struggles for the words.

dialogue.text: He struggles for the words.

segments.content: Your tissue, your organs, your entire
biophysical structure is changing.
Every system is still functioning,
somehow --
And they're changing into...
I don't really know.  A compound
organic-metallic alloy.  Stronger than

Like the shields Reed said would

(cold fury, deadly focus)
How long?
At this rate, the infection should be
complete in two, maybe three weeks --
What do you mean "complete"?
I wish I could tell you.  I can't
pretend to know what we're dealing
with here.  I'll notify the CDC and --
Victor hardens, razor sharp.
What?
The Center for Disease Control.  If
this thing is contagious --
WHHM!  Victor GRABS the Doctor by the throat.
Look at me.  I have a life.  I'm the
face of a billion-dollar-company... We
need to keep this confidential,
understand?
Victor's grip TIGHTENS around the man's throat.
But...this disease...is progressive...
degenerative...
With one cobra-swift move, Victor thrusts his metallic arm into the doctor, killing him instantly.  Victor retracts his arm, and looks at it, shocked by his own strength.

Building, spending hours searching for the cure.  He checks

(fast, charged)
The plants, from space.  Their
particles are still charged.  With the
right amount of energy, those ions

Sue follows Reed.  He flips through a file, excited.
If we can build a machine to re-create
the storm, we can reverse the polarity --
(realizing)
And reverse the mutations --
(talking more to himself)
Curing countless diseases, not just
ours.
She looks at him.
But we're the focus, right Reed?
Reed...?
Of course.  Of course.
And you sure you can control this
thing?  Last time didn't work out so
well.
(preoccupied, mind
spinning)
With the right energy, we can
stabilize the storm.  Maybe tie into
the city grid...
He keeps his head down, making notes, entering --

Reed and Sue enter.  Reed is looking for something.  Sue

She stares at shelves upon shelves of overcrowded clutter.

about us?  Please.  This is business.
(leaning forward, intense)
I need to know: how close is Reed
to finding to a cure?

He's working round the clock.  But the
data needs to be tested, analyzed

Same old Reed.  All analysis, no
action.  Wasn't that the problem with
you two?
She holds tight, keeping cool.
If these molecules aren't stable, they
could make us worse, maybe even kill
us.
Then why is Reed dragging his feet?
Maybe he likes having his prize
specimen under glass...
(closer, cruel)
It's ironic, isn't it?  You're finally
the perfect woman for him...because
you're his science project.
The words sting.  She can't help but hear some truth in them.
Please don't make this personal --
Oh, I think you already have.
Victor, we can't do anything until the
research is ready.

"We," huh?

Don't forget who you work for, Susan.

segments.content: Reed enters -- overworked, unshaved.  He keeps his head down, preoccupied.  Sue shifts focus.

dialogue.text: Reed enters -- overworked, unshaved.  He keeps his head down, preoccupied.  Sue shifts focus.

segments.content: Have you read these...?  From all
over.  People want us to fight crimes...
save their kids...solve their problems...
(no response from Reed)
...when we can't even solve our
own.
She puts the letters down, steps closer to Reed.
Reed.  How close are we to a cure?
No way to know.  Without more
tests, experiments.
She considers.  Victor's words echo in her head.
We're not specimens, we're patients.
This isn't just another science
project to you, is it...?
Reed looks up, a little surprised.  He opens his mouth, but --

REVEAL: JOHNNY standing next to an X GAMES REPORTER.  He is

18' high mountains of dirt, thirty feet in the air.
Not too much, but I will say that it's
all weather and no leather.  Kind of
Ben, Sue, and Reed stare at the wall-sized TV.  Mouths agape.

segments.content: He didn't.
Oh, he did.
She turns to Reed, who gives a sheepish shrug, and peels back his labcoat revealing a "4" stitched onto his chest too.

dialogue.text: She turns to Reed, who gives a sheepish shrug, and peels back his labcoat revealing a "4" stitched onto his chest too.

So what are your superhero names?
I go by the Human Torch.  The ladies

Johnny hadn't really thought about them.  He spitballs:

character.name: What about the rest of the team?

Girl...?!
That's easy to remember.  And Reed
Richards?  He's the leader.  So
what's he?  Mr. Fantastic?
Reed shrugs.  He doesn't hate the name.

character.name: Well, I wouldn't say he's the leader.

dialogue.text: Reed shrugs.  He doesn't hate the name.

segments.content: Case in point: a photo of Ben fills the TV.

dialogue.text: Case in point: a photo of Ben fills the TV.

segments.content: What about this one?  What do you call
this Thing?
Johnny smiles, looking right into camera.
That's it.  Just The Thing.  We would
have gone with The Rock, but it was
taken.  And "Thing" pretty much sums
it up.
A LAUGH from the studio audience.
(matter-of-fact)
He turns to go.  Reed wraps an arm around Ben.

character.name: Okay.  I'm gonna go kill him now.

dialogue.text: He turns to go.  Reed wraps an arm around Ben.

segments.content: He sees a photo of himself on screen.

character.name: Ben!  Slow down a second and --

dialogue.text: He sees a photo of himself on screen.

segments.content: Is it true what they say?  That he can
expand any part of his anatomy?
Actually, between us, I think he's got
some problems staying rigid.
(finishing his thought to Ben)
...wait for me...
Which may explain why this woman's
not smiling.

segments.content: I'm driving.

What?!

What if some of us don't want to be

Johnny hurls a FIREBALL that SMACKS Ben in the back of the

Ben gets hit with ANOTHER FIREBALL.  This time in the face.

dialogue.text: Ben gets hit with ANOTHER FIREBALL.  This time in the face.

segments.content: Okay, that's it, tinkerbell!  You want

Ben charges like a bull, fist cocked back, and...Reed steps

The crowd stands stunned.  So do Reed and Sue.  Cameras pop.
Johnny slowly pulls himself up.  The paint on the truck

Let's see if we can get blood from a
stone.
He and Ben lock eyes, with a block of sidewalk between them.
High Noon.  They start to RUN toward each other...
When they are almost within range, Sue STEPS BETWEEN THEM,
stops them both in their tracks with just a look.  Like a
mom:
You two need a time-out.
Ben just stalks off.  The crowd clears, scared.  A PAPARAZZI snaps a picture.  Ben GRABS his camera, and flicks the lens. EXT. STREETS - DAY Sue looks at Johnny, more disappointed than angry.

Act.  Here we go again.  Reed, what if

Johnny nods, totally missing the sarcasm.
Reed looks at him, disgusted.  Johnny waves to the crowd, hand flaming.  People SHRIEK, snap pictures.  Johnny smiles at Reed.

He's always been a hothead --
It's not him.  It's them.

I can't live like this.
Just give Reed a little more time.
You know how he works -- analyzing

It's easy for you to be patient.
No, it's not.  I thought I was done

He slows down, gets closer, intense.
Together?  Look at me, Susie.  You got

heading.subject: MENT BANK
heading.raw_text: INT. INVESTMENT BANK - CONFERENCE ROOM - DAY

segments.content:
The news plays on the TV.  Head Banker Ned Cecil freezes the

               screen on an image of...THE THING.  He turns to Victor, who

               sits with the rest of the bankers.  Cold, sterile

               environment.
This is how you "turn things around"?
These freaks are on the front page and
your company's in the obituaries.
Victor has a larger bandage on his face now.
I have a plan to use their publicity
for --
Victor, stop.  The bank's lost enough
already.  This isn't a negotiation.
It's a notification.  We're pulling
out.
A cold, silent beat.  Victor leans forward.
You need to look long-term here.
Without risk, there's no --
Reward.  We all know the sales
pitch, Vic.  And frankly, we're
done buying... Gentlemen.
He motions to his men.  They all stand.  Victor is the lone
man sitting.  PUSH IN on Victor's face, his inner rage
palpable.  A few quick surges of electricity emanate from his
body.  This man is getting stronger, more electric.

heading.raw_text: INT. BANK - UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE - DAY

segments.content:
After hours.  The floor is slick with water -- puddles in

               every direction.  Ned Cecil comes out of the elevator,

               heading for his car.  As he goes, the structure lights start

               to flicker.  Ned looks up, watches the lights go out one by

               one, furthest to closest.  He looks around.  Unnerved by the

               darkness.
A hanging beat.  Victor steps out from shadows.

dialogue.text: A hanging beat.  Victor steps out from shadows.

segments.content: (relieved, almost)
Von Doom?  Gave me a little shock.  No
hard feelings, right?  Nothing
personal.
Victor says nothing.  Ned keeps going.
You know, you could always move back
to Latvura, start fresh.
He mispronounces Latveria, dripping condescension.
Maybe that's where you belong, back in
the "old country."
That does it.  A surge of electricity courses through Victor.
His eyes narrow, and the electricity crackles down his leg to
THE GROUND.  The electric spark hits the water and...

heading.subject: RRENTS RACE ACROSS THE GROUND, SLITHERING
heading.raw_text: ELECTRIC CURRENTS RACE ACROSS THE GROUND, SLITHERING

segments.content:
LIGHTNING-FAST ACROSS THE WATER (like deadly electric

               snakes), heading straight for Ned.  His eyes go wide.  And...

               NED IS ELECTROCUTED!  His body spasms.  THUD!  He slumps,

               dead.  Smoke rises from his body.  Victor stands, power

               swelling.

               For the first time, his SCAR SPLITS OPEN, revealing a METAL

               GLOW beneath the skin.  He remains scary calm.
It's pronounced Latveria.
(looking down at the dead body)

Victor walks away, the final lights going to DARKNESS. INT. VICTOR'S OFFICE - DAY Victor enters, still adrenalized.  He turns to the light switch, and the lights come on.  He approaches his screens, and the monitors flicker to life.  His powers are growing. One MONITOR rolls the news.  IMAGES of the FANTASTIC FOUR. Victor leans closer, and the VOLUME automatically goes up.

heading.raw_text: INT. BAXTER BUILDING - TRANSFORMATION LAB - DAY

segments.content:
Reed enters the room carrying a stack of boxes that no normal

               man could balance.  But he is not normal.  His arms are

               wrapped around the boxes five times over -- like human twine. 

               He stops short, and drops the boxes when he sees...

               VICTOR overseeing a group of TECHNICIANS.  They are boxing up

               Reed's work -- all of his equipment, research.  Victor wears

               a bandage, covering his scar.  Reed eyes a glint of METAL.
Victor turns away.

dialogue.text: Victor turns away.

segments.content: Don't worry about me.  Worry about
yourself.
Reed looks around, seeing his lab turned inside out.
What are you doing here?
What I should have done a long time
ago.  Applications and patents, Reed.
Reed reaches out, grabbing a folder from a box.

dialogue.text: Reed reaches out, grabbing a folder from a box.

segments.content: But I'm not done with the machine --
Analysis is over.  It's time for
action.  My men could have mass-
produced this by now.
Reed shakes his head, defending himself.
Mass-produced?  This isn't a
toaster.  You have no idea how it
works.
Victor pulls the folder from Reed's hand, and whips out the
intricate DIAGRAM of the MACHINE.  He points to parts:
Re-create the storm, invert the
polarity here, reverse the mutation
there.  Don't talk to me like I'm some
schoolboy.  I've got the same Phd you
do.
Reed is a little surprised that Victor is so familiar with

heading.raw_text: his machine.  He points to a SECURE CHAMBER on the blueprint.

segments.content: The storm needs to be handled exactly
right, or it could make our mutations
worse, much worse, maybe even kill
us...
Victor slows.  Is Reed getting to him?  Or giving him ideas?
Victor, please.  We need time to
verify the data... We can't afford any
mistakes -- there's only enough ions
for two or three attempts.

We'll build it, while you check the

This ain't permanent.  My friend

there.  Walking around like some kind
of circus freak.  People staring,

I wouldn't know anything about that.
I mean...
Tell me.  When you grew up in

(a beat)
You went your own way then.  You
didn't listen to people.  So why start

As he ponders that, we hear a CROWD SWELLING on the CUT TO --

Fans swarm JOHNNY.  He signs autographs, poses for pictures.

EXT./INT. LIMO - NIGHT Johnny climbs in, sees...three impossibly gorgeous MODELS.

segments.content: A few fans.  Hope you don't mind.
He smiles, sitting down in the middle of them.

character.name: Gotta take care of the fans, right?

dialogue.text: He smiles, sitting down in the middle of them.

segments.content: Look, I built my business knowing what
people want.  And right now, the
people want you.
Johnny eyes the models, all lusting.
And we don't want to let the people
down now, do we?
No we don't.  Which is why we need
to strike while the iron's hot.
I'm talking action figures,
videogames, sponsors --
Victor nods, knowing he has Johnny on the hook.

dialogue.text: Victor nods, knowing he has Johnny on the hook.

segments.content: You talk to Reed and Sue about this?
Johnny.  Let's be honest here.  Ben,
Reed, Sue.  Good people, all.  But
stars?
(shaking his head, a beat)
I don't want to break up the band, but
you're the one they want.  Don't you
think it's time to go solo...?
Victor subtly nods to the models.  They envelop Johnny.
Take the car for a spin.  Think about
it.  Is this the life you want?  Or
would you rather live in Reed's
lab...?
The car stops.  Victor gets out.  He stands on the pavement.
As he shuts the door, we see the women climbing onto Johnny.
The door shuts, and...
WHHHMMMPF!  The windows all suddenly STEAM UP!

STARS on the ceiling.  A VOICE drones about the galaxy.  In

               the LAST ROW, we find: Reed and Sue.  Reed is thinking about

               work.
I could get Ben to tap into the
Baxter's main power to generate enough
voltage --
Reed.  Shh.  Just be quiet.  And look
up.
He slowly looks up.  The stars seem to calm him.
Remember our first date here...?  God,
I was so nervous.
You were?
Of course I was.  I'd read all your
papers on bioethics.  Some of them two
times just so I'd have something to
say to you.
Reed smiles softly, thinking back.
You know, I bribed the projectionist
ten bucks to keep it open late?
They laugh.  Sue looks up to the stars.  Quiet:

dialogue.text: They laugh.  Sue looks up to the stars.  Quiet:

segments.content: Reed looks at her.  Wrestles with a decision.  Then quietly:

character.name: I didn't want that night to end.

segments.content: Sue, you were right.  It wasn't
complicated.  I just wasn't ready to
be...to become...
(a beat)
She knows.  He trails off.  Sue looks at him.

character.name: You can be a little intimidating.

dialogue.text: She knows.  He trails off.  Sue looks at him.

segments.content: You always talked about how you liked
the kind of man who could approach
you...speak his mind.  One who wasn't
afraid to tell you what he wanted.
I did.  I did, Reed...but I wanted
you to be that man.
Someone SHUSHES them.  They slump down further.  Closer.
When I walked out, I waited ten
minutes outside your door.  Ten.
Waiting for you to come find me.
Why didn't you say something?
That would have kinda defeated the
purpose.  And Reed...
(closer, emotional)
Their eyes lock.  A heated beat.  No more secrets.  Their faces are close.  A kiss is coming.  Closer, closer.  Sue disappears.

dialogue.text: Their eyes lock.  A heated beat.  No more secrets.  Their faces are close.  A kiss is coming.  Closer, closer.  Sue disappears.

segments.content: (quiet, playful)
Reed tentatively leans into the kiss, and...

dialogue.text: Reed tentatively leans into the kiss, and...

segments.content: That's my nose, genius... These are my
lips.
Reed's face is SQUEEZED on both sides by Sue's invisible
hands.  She pulls him into a KISS.  Lips touch.  Soft,
tender.  Stars twinkle.  And we slowly DISSOLVE TO --

Ben and Alicia step out together.  The crowd quiets, turns. 

               A few whispers flutter.  Alicia leans close to Ben, and slips

               her arm into his.  The party goes back to normal.
Look around.  I'll get us drinks.
They always let blind girls cut the
line.
She walks off.  He watches her go.  The way her hair moves.
The lines of her neck.  The light on her skin.  This woman is
the most beautiful thing Ben has ever seen.  He's falling
hard.
Ben steps through the crowd.  The swanky guests give strained
smiles, polite.  Ben is starting to feel comfortable here.
He keeps his eyes on Alicia, who talks to guests.
Ben hangs back, happy to watch her.  A few patrons pass him,
thinking he's just an inanimate statue.
I don't know about this one.  It lacks
a certain...realism.
Ben keeps his eyes on Alicia.  He overhears two BOHEMIAN
GIRLS, who assume he's a statue.
She's always had a thing for runaways
and strays, but this is ridiculous.
I know.  Did she really think these
sculptures would sell?
Like anybody would want this thing in
their house.  That girl's a one-woman
charity.
Ben just stands there, frozen.  His eyes dart around the
room, paranoid now.  Aware of people staring, laughing.  He
glances at Alicia, who giggles at something else.  Ten
seconds ago, this would have been dreamy.  Now it's damning.
We stay with Alicia, who cuts through the crowd, emerging
where she left Ben.  She has a PITCHER of wine in hand for
him.  But Ben is gone.  She looks disappointed, hearing his
heavy FOOTSTEPS get softer and softer in the distance.
THUNDER booms on the CUT TO --

A pitstop in Queens.  Heavy RAIN swims down windows.  BEN

               sits at the COUNTER, with his hat pulled low, coat tight. 

               Nobody sits within four chairs of him.  He sips coffee in a

               metal bowl.  A long beat.  Then...
Ben turns to see...VICTOR.

dialogue.text: Ben turns to see...VICTOR.

segments.content: What are you doing here?
I'm worried about you.
About me?  How sweet.
Come on.  Let me buy you something to
eat.  Looks like you could use the
company.
Ben considers.  A man deeply alone.  A beat.

Victor and Ben sit in a window booth.  A waitress sets a

               foothigh stack of pancakes in front of Ben, removes huge

               plates he's just cleared.  Victor's aware of the other

               customers in the diner staring at Ben.  Ben burps: it rattles

               the plates.
'Scuse me.
I know it can't be easy.  Life hasn't
changed that much for Reed, Sue and
Johnny.  At least they can go out in
public.  But for you?  People staring.
Whispering behind your back...
If you're trying to cheer me up you're
doing a helluva job --
I'm just saying, I know what it's like
to lose something you love.  To see it
slip away, and know it's never coming
back.
The Thing shoves a huge piece of pie in his mouth.
Reed's gonna fix me up --
For your sake I hope you're right.
I'm sorry if that sounds a little
skeptical.
Ben doesn't trust him.  But Victor is hitting pressure points.

dialogue.text: Ben doesn't trust him.  But Victor is hitting pressure points.

segments.content: Look, he's a brilliant man, we should
trust he's working as hard as he can.
You're his best friend.  So what
possible reason could he have for
taking his time?
(a beat)
I mean, other than getting close to

Off The Thing: a seed of doubt has been planted.  He can't help but find truth in the words.  And we CUT TO -- INT. BAXTER BUILDING - TRANSFORMATION LAB - NIGHT Reed and Sue return, laughing quietly, bodies close.  Reed turns on the lights, and they flinch when they see...BEN.  He sits waiting, scowling.  They stop laughing immediately.

dialogue.text: Off The Thing: a seed of doubt has been planted.  He can't help but find truth in the words.  And we CUT TO -- INT. BAXTER BUILDING - TRANSFORMATION LAB - NIGHT Reed and Sue return, laughing quietly, bodies close.  Reed turns on the lights, and they flinch when they see...BEN.  He sits waiting, scowling.  They stop laughing immediately.

segments.content: The construction of the TRANSFORMATION CHAMBER is complete. The Technicians are gone now.

character.name: Yeah, I have that effect on people.

dialogue.text: The construction of the TRANSFORMATION CHAMBER is complete. The Technicians are gone now.

segments.content: Ben --
Oh, you remember my name do you?  You
happen to remember what you swore to
do with every breath in your body?
We're working as hard as we can --
He motions to Reed and Sue together.

character.name: Yeah.  I can tell.  Victor was right.

dialogue.text: He motions to Reed and Sue together.

segments.content: Sue looks a little hurt.

dialogue.text: Sue looks a little hurt.

segments.content: Glad "nothing" could take you away
from your work.
Ben, I don't know if this thing'll
change us back or make us worse.
I need you to be patient for a little
while longe--
He POKES his finger into Reed's chest, which INDENTS around
it like the Pillsbury Doughboy.  Ben pushes Reed back.  Hard.
He grabs Reed's face, his fingers INDENTING the skin.  He THROWS Reed back.  Reed slams down to the ground.

character.name: Look at me, Reed.  Look at me!

dialogue.text: He grabs Reed's face, his fingers INDENTING the skin.  He THROWS Reed back.  Reed slams down to the ground.

segments.content: I am looking.  That's why I can't make
a mistake!  I've got to get it right,
and it's not right yet!  We need to
test this.
Ben shakes his head, looking down at Reed.
I spent my whole life protecting you,
from the schoolyard to the stars.  For
what?  So you could play Twister with
your girlfriend while I'm the freak of
the week?
Reed tries to stand, but Ben KNOCKS him back.  Reed slams
into the wall, and stays down this time.
She starts to raise her hands to throw force-fields.

character.name: Ben!  Stop it!  Or I'll stop it.

dialogue.text: She starts to raise her hands to throw force-fields.

segments.content: As Ben turns to her, Reed takes this opportunity to WRAP Ben up like a python.  They struggle.  Ben runs back into a wall to shake Reed.  Their faces are close, heated.

dialogue.text: As Ben turns to her, Reed takes this opportunity to WRAP Ben up like a python.  They struggle.  Ben runs back into a wall to shake Reed.  Their faces are close, heated.

segments.content: Good thing you're flexible enough to
watch your own back.  'Cause you're on
your own now.
Ben seems to relax and Reed lets go.  Ben walks out.  Sue
comes to Reed's side.  He's bleeding.
I'm OK.  Just go, go after him.  Stop
him.
She heads out.  Reed slowly stands.  He looks at the
transformation machine.  It's not ready.  But...Reed steps
toward it.  As he walks, his image goes grainy in --

Victor gets closer to his screens, watching Reed's every

               step.  This is what Victor has been waiting for.  His screens

               flicker with static -- he's too close, but he can't pull

               back.  He sees: REED TURNS ON THE MACHINE.  Hits a countdown. 

               And he grabs his UNIFORM...

Sue hustles down the long hall.  Ben turns a corner, passing

               the elevators, heading toward a FREIGHT ELEVATOR.  She gets

               there too late.  Doors close, going down.

segments.content: Ben pounds across the lobby.  He sees Johnny coming in.
He holds up an ACTION FIGURE of BEN: a horribly bloated body topped by a tiny pinhead.  Johnny pushes a button and --

character.name: Christmas come early!  Check it out!

dialogue.text: He holds up an ACTION FIGURE of BEN: a horribly bloated body topped by a tiny pinhead.  Johnny pushes a button and --

segments.content:
WITH ONE ARM, Ben shoves Johnny into a wall.  With his other

               hand, Ben grabs the toy and SMASHES it into the wall, inches

               from Johnny's head.  The toy lodges into the plaster.
Hey!  That's a prototype!
He strides away. INT. BAXTER BUILDING - GROUND FLOOR - NIGHT DING.  Sue speeds out of the elevator.  No sign of Ben.  She runs into...JOHNNY who shakes off the encounter.

character.name: Go back to the drawing board.

dialogue.text: He strides away. INT. BAXTER BUILDING - GROUND FLOOR - NIGHT DING.  Sue speeds out of the elevator.  No sign of Ben.  She runs into...JOHNNY who shakes off the encounter.

segments.content: Johnny?  Did you see Ben?
Yeah, for the last time, I hope.  I'm
done with this freak show.  I'm moving
back to the real world.
Is that what you call it?  "Real"?
At least it beats living in a lab like
somebody's science project.
This hits home.  Sue is quiet.  Johnny turns to go.
Johnny, slow down.  Think.  You know
mom didn't raise us to --
Look around, sis!  She's not here.  So
you can stop talking to me like I'm
your little boy --
As soon as you stop acting like one.
Come on, you're smarter than this.
You think those people out there care
about you?  You're just a fad to them.
He pulls away from her, taking a step out the door.
Let's try something new: you live
your life.  And I'll live mine.
(beat)
And just for the record: they LOVE
me.
He strides into the night, leaving Sue alone.  A dark night.
The Fantastic Four is no more.  The family is split apart.

The transformation chamber is up and running.  Numbers count

               down.  The storm swirls in the chamber.  Reed now wears the

               UNIFORM.  He opens the door:

heading.subject: ELF.  HE IS FINALLY TAKING
heading.raw_text: HE'S GOING TO USE IT ON HIMSELF.  HE IS FINALLY TAKING

segments.content:
Reed gets closer.  His heart races.  So does Victor's.  A

               moment of truth for both of them.  REED STEPS INTO THE

Reed looks up at the cosmic storm.  He opens his arms, ready

               to risk his life.  And...WHHHM!  He JOLTS in JUMP-CUT-MOTION,

               RECONFIGURING, JERKING out of control, and we CUT TO --

His screens GO BLACK.  He looks out the window to see...a

               flash atop the BAXTER BUILDING.  The tip of the Baxter glows.

segments.content: Lights go haywire.  Sue knows immediately...

INT. BAXTER BUILDING - TRANSFORMATION LAB - NIGHT Lights flicker in darkness.  The door rips open.  Sue lunges inside.  She sees through smoke and sparks...REED sways in the chamber.  A beat.  Did it work?  Then... Reed SLUMPS TO THE GROUND.  His eyes flutter back.  Dead...? His body is warped, twisted -- one half remains tense, hard, while the other half is loose, soft, almost melted.

His body is warped, twisted -- one half remains tense, hard, while the other half is loose, soft, almost melted.

segments.content: What did you do, Reed?  What did you
do?
Victor watches every second on his monitors.

heading.raw_text: INT. BAXTER BUILDING - TRANSFORMATION LAB - NIGHT

segments.content:
Sue struggles to lift Reed -- half of his body is STRETCHED

               OUT, devoid of any semblance of bone structure.  One side of

               his face looks like it's MELTING OFF.
I can...make it work.
Reed, stop, you need to rest your --
The power...I need...more power...to
control...the storm --
Reed loses consciousness.  Sue carries him out. INT. VICTOR'S OFFICE - NIGHT Victor watches, his eyes narrow, looking at his hands.

dialogue.text: Reed loses consciousness.  Sue carries him out. INT. VICTOR'S OFFICE - NIGHT Victor watches, his eyes narrow, looking at his hands.

segments.content: He reaches out for his phone, and...his SPEAKERPHONE AUTOMATICALLY TURNS ON.  His powers growing.

dialogue.text: He reaches out for his phone, and...his SPEAKERPHONE AUTOMATICALLY TURNS ON.  His powers growing.

segments.content: EXT. UNDER THE BROOKLYN BRIDGE - NIGHT Ben sits alone, looking at city lights.  A man without a home.  Without a family.  A hard beat.  HEADLIGHTS slash across Ben.  He slowly turns, blinded in the lights of...a LIMO.

character.name: Leonard.  Bring me our lab rat.

dialogue.text: EXT. UNDER THE BROOKLYN BRIDGE - NIGHT Ben sits alone, looking at city lights.  A man without a home.  Without a family.  A hard beat.  HEADLIGHTS slash across Ben.  He slowly turns, blinded in the lights of...a LIMO.

segments.content: Ben!  They need you back at the Baxter
building.  It's...Reed.
Ben considers.  Despite it all, he's a good friend.  And a
good man.  As he gets into the car, we hear THROBBING MUSIC

LOUD MUSIC and PULSATING LIGHTS.  A young crowd dances and

               grinds to the beat.  Among the colorful lights, STREAKS OF

               FLAME swirl around the ceiling.  We follow them to:

               A BALCONY, where we see JOHNNY sitting in a cozy VIP section. 

               He's surrounded by "groupies" climbing over each other to get

               a look at his various parlour tricks.

               He leans closer to a YOUNG WOMAN.  Closer.  Candles around

               them start to melt.  Beads of sweat drip down her face.
She pauses.  And...a very LARGE MAN steps up.

character.name: What do you say we get out of here?

dialogue.text: She pauses.  And...a very LARGE MAN steps up.

segments.content: The Boyfriend doesn't look too happy.

dialogue.text: The Boyfriend doesn't look too happy.

segments.content: Is that all you do?  Bar tricks and
stealing chicks...
Johnny does one more trick...taps the guy's drink...igniting
it into a burst of flame.  The Boyfriend drops the glass,
which SMASHES on the ground...catches the floor on fire.
The boyfriend quickly moves in and stamps it out.
What are you doing?!  You could have
burned somebody!
The boyfriend takes his girlfriend's hand, they start to walk
off.  She turns back for one last comment...
You know, if I had your power I'd be
doing something with it, not wasting
my time doing cheap bar tricks,
hitting on some other guy's girl.
Johnny looks a little embarrassed.  The couple leaves.
Johnny glances around.  His FANS look down, away.  He sees
how quickly they can turn.  The crowd parts slightly.  He
looks very alone.

Leonard leads The Thing inside.  The ominous chamber sits

               with its door open.  Victor enters from the control station.
Ben, come in.
What is this?  Where's Reed?
Ben looks at the flickering lights.  Suspicious.  Victor turns to Leonard, who looks a little scared by this dark room.

character.name: Where do you think?  With Sue.

dialogue.text: Ben looks at the flickering lights.  Suspicious.  Victor turns to Leonard, who looks a little scared by this dark room.

segments.content: (quiet)
Leonard nods, all too eager to get the hell out of here.

character.name: I'll take it from here, Leonard.

dialogue.text: Leonard nods, all too eager to get the hell out of here.

segments.content: Leonard disappears fast, as Victor turns back to Ben.

dialogue.text: Leonard disappears fast, as Victor turns back to Ben.

segments.content: What do you want, Vic?
To help you.  I've run every test
known to man.  And they all yield the
same result: the machine is ready.
Ben shakes his head, wanting to believe, but...
Reed said it'd be weeks till --
He also said we'd avoid that storm in
space.  And we know how that turned
out.
Ben nods.  Reed was wrong before.  Ben gets closer to the
machine, drawn to it.  He wants to believe, so badly.
He couldn't generate enough power for
the machine to reach critical mass.
Yet another mistake for "Mr.
Fantastic."
Victor stands in shadows, but we see the tiniest little SPARK around him.  The lights...?  Or his skin...?

character.name: And you can?  Power it up?

dialogue.text: Victor stands in shadows, but we see the tiniest little SPARK around him.  The lights...?  Or his skin...?

segments.content: He keeps his arm behind his back -- his fingertips course with ELECTRICITY.  It starts to build, sparking up his arm.

character.name: Yes.  I've found a new energy source.

dialogue.text: He keeps his arm behind his back -- his fingertips course with ELECTRICITY.  It starts to build, sparking up his arm.

segments.content: Tell me...do you want to be Ben Grimm
again?
Ben keeps his eyes on the machine.  His dream is alive.

Victor pushes a control; the doors of the chamber slowly close and seal.  Thing shuts his eyes.  He just wants to be Ben again. FROM THE CONTROLS: Victor initiates the transformation sequence.  As lights go on inside the chamber, they dim in the lab.  Energy pumps into the chamber.  The storm swirls faster. Suddenly, a BRIGHT FLASH emerges from the window of the Baxter Building.  The rest of the city lights dim slightly. INT. BAXTER BUILDING LIVING QUARTERS - NIGHT Reed lies in bed, weak, recuperating. The chamber rattles dangerously, as the power seems to SHAKE the very foundation of the building. And then it's over.  The light dies down...somewhat.  It still pulses along with the chamber.  The chamber door SLIDES OPEN. Beat.  And...BEN GRIMM steps out.  Not The Thing.  No more rocks.  BEN GRIMM.  Naked, tired, but finally A NORMAL MAN. He slips on his trench-coat -- now way too large.  He collapses.  He stares at his hands, his arms...it worked.

Everyone thought I was safe behind

Victor, the machine worked for me.  It

Ben starts to realize...

DOOM smiles, nods, stronger than Ben now.

character.name: And no Thing to stand in your way.

destiny.

outsmarted the great Reed Richards --
Victor, this isn't the way to --
(a dark smile)
You always know best.  So tell me.
What happens when you superheat

Mister Hyde on us --
Really?  With a name like Von Doom?
Sue looks around.  Only one question.  Dead serious:

dialogue.text: Sue looks around.  Only one question.  Dead serious:

segments.content: Where is Reed?

INT. VON DOOM - CONFERENCE ROOM - NIGHT Doom sits at the head of the table in an eerie parallel to the opening scene.  Those mysterious CRATES loom in shadows. He wears a green HOOD, and METAL MASK over his scarred face. Doom's eyes turn toward...the other end of the table.

dialogue.text: INT. VON DOOM - CONFERENCE ROOM - NIGHT Doom sits at the head of the table in an eerie parallel to the opening scene.  Those mysterious CRATES loom in shadows. He wears a green HOOD, and METAL MASK over his scarred face. Doom's eyes turn toward...the other end of the table.

segments.content: Chemistry 101, Part Two.  What
happens to rubber when it's super-
cooled?
We now see what he sees: Reed sits in a chair with TUBES
INJECTED into his skin FREEZING HIM SOLID!  Ultra-cold vapor
coats him.  Doom steps closer, a sadistic smile.
Reed tries to move but can't even ball his hand into a fist.
He PRESSES DOWN on one of Reed's fingers, which makes a horrific CRACKING SOUND.  Reed's face twists with pain.

dialogue.text: He PRESSES DOWN on one of Reed's fingers, which makes a horrific CRACKING SOUND.  Reed's face twists with pain.

segments.content: Doom seems to enjoy every CRACK.  He leans closer.

dialogue.text: Doom seems to enjoy every CRACK.  He leans closer.

segments.content: You don't know the meaning of the
word.
Doom lets up on Reed and reaches into a crate, and pulls out
a military-issue ROCKET-LAUNCHER.  He aims at the city
skyline, locking onto his target: JOHNNY STORM.
Johnny's HEAT SIGNATURE glows.  The screen flashes: TARGET ACQUIRED.  Doom looks back at Reed, his launcher aimed casually over his shoulder.

dialogue.text: Johnny's HEAT SIGNATURE glows.  The screen flashes: TARGET ACQUIRED.  Doom looks back at Reed, his launcher aimed casually over his shoulder.

segments.content: BOOOOM!  He fires without looking!  A MISSILE blasts into the sky.  THE MISSILE LIGHTS UP THE DARK NIGHT beginning its wide turn towards its target. INT. BAXTER BUILDING Johnny, Ben, and Sue hear the missile being fired and turn to the window -- it BANKS, coming STRAIGHT for them.  They move to -- EXT. BAXTER BUILDING BALCONY - NIGHT Johnny rushes toward the edge, to get a good look at the missile streaking closer.  As he moves, the missile SHIFTS slightly with HIS MOTION!  His eyes narrow, thinking. He FLAMES ON a HAND.  He waves his flaming hand, and the MISSILE locks onto the fire!  Johnny darkens, realizing...

dialogue.text: BOOOOM!  He fires without looking!  A MISSILE blasts into the sky.  THE MISSILE LIGHTS UP THE DARK NIGHT beginning its wide turn towards its target. INT. BAXTER BUILDING Johnny, Ben, and Sue hear the missile being fired and turn to the window -- it BANKS, coming STRAIGHT for them.  They move to -- EXT. BAXTER BUILDING BALCONY - NIGHT Johnny rushes toward the edge, to get a good look at the missile streaking closer.  As he moves, the missile SHIFTS slightly with HIS MOTION!  His eyes narrow, thinking. He FLAMES ON a HAND.  He waves his flaming hand, and the MISSILE locks onto the fire!  Johnny darkens, realizing...

segments.content: His mind races.  He makes a decision, and steps up onto the ledge, hundreds of feet above the street.

dialogue.text: His mind races.  He makes a decision, and steps up onto the ledge, hundreds of feet above the street.

segments.content: What are you doing --
Sis.  Let me take care of you for
once.
Johnny considers, a half-beat.  He looks out.  Under breath:

dialogue.text: Johnny considers, a half-beat.  He looks out.  Under breath:

segments.content: Well then this'll be one hell of a
basejump.
Sue reaches out to stop him, but Johnny DIVES HEROICALLY OFF
THE EDGE!  He FLAMES ON!  The missile follows his arc.  As he
drops, his clothes BURN OFF, revealing his UNIFORM.
(under breath)
He falls lower, lower.  And...he...BANKS!  SWOOPS UP! FLYING!

dialogue.text: He falls lower, lower.  And...he...BANKS!  SWOOPS UP! FLYING!

segments.content: Sue watches, with fear, and a hint of pride.
Sue shakes her head, sympathetic.

dialogue.text: Sue shakes her head, sympathetic.

segments.content: Ben, you got what we all wanted.
You need to stay here.  It's too
dangerous.
She heads off.  Ben watches her go, helpless.

heading.raw_text: INT. BAXTER BUILDING - REVERSION LAB - NIGHT

segments.content:
Ben steps back into this ravaged room.  Through the shattered

               window, he sees Johnny's FLAMES streaking away.  A hard beat.

EXT. NEW YORK - NIGHT Johnny zigs and zags, but the missile takes every twist and turn, gaining on him, bearing down.  Cars slow, stop.  More people look up, scared, pointing at this stunning sight. INT. VON DOOM CONFERENCE ROOM - NIGHT Eerily silent.  Reed tries to move, but he is FROZEN.  He hears a footstep.  But the room is EMPTY.  No sign of Doom even.  A beat.  He hears a CREAK.  Another CREAK, closer. And... A FREEZING TUBE starts to SHIFT.  It goes taut, clearly being manipulated by a hand -- an INVISIBLE HAND.  Sue APPEARS next to Reed, tube in hand.  She tries to stay calm.

dialogue.text: EXT. NEW YORK - NIGHT Johnny zigs and zags, but the missile takes every twist and turn, gaining on him, bearing down.  Cars slow, stop.  More people look up, scared, pointing at this stunning sight. INT. VON DOOM CONFERENCE ROOM - NIGHT Eerily silent.  Reed tries to move, but he is FROZEN.  He hears a footstep.  But the room is EMPTY.  No sign of Doom even.  A beat.  He hears a CREAK.  Another CREAK, closer. And... A FREEZING TUBE starts to SHIFT.  It goes taut, clearly being manipulated by a hand -- an INVISIBLE HAND.  Sue APPEARS next to Reed, tube in hand.  She tries to stay calm.

segments.content: Reed's eyes shift to see...Doom emerge from the darkness.

character.name: What has he done to you?

dialogue.text: Reed's eyes shift to see...Doom emerge from the darkness.

segments.content: How romantic.
Victor, please --
He steps closer.  Electrodes course over his metal skin.

dialogue.text: He steps closer.  Electrodes course over his metal skin.

segments.content: We know the machine works.  It worked
on Ben, it'll work on you.  We can
turn you back --
Do you really think fate turned us
into gods so we could refuse these
gifts?
She hardens, a little force field starts to emanate from her.
Victor.  You always thought you were
god.
Doom has a hand behind his back, generating an energy blast.
Sue please, let's not fight.
She HURLS a force-field at him.  It CONNECTS, KNOCKING him back a half-step.  But he simply shakes it off, and steps up. Too powerful.  He smiles.  His arms CRACKLE with electricity.

dialogue.text: She HURLS a force-field at him.  It CONNECTS, KNOCKING him back a half-step.  But he simply shakes it off, and steps up. Too powerful.  He smiles.  His arms CRACKLE with electricity.

segments.content: BOOM!  He FIRES an ELECTRIC SHOCKWAVE that LAUNCHES her back. She spirals through the air, crashing into the wall, THUDDING to the floor.  As Doom stalks closer, Sue gathers her strength to...GO INVISIBLE.

dialogue.text: BOOM!  He FIRES an ELECTRIC SHOCKWAVE that LAUNCHES her back. She spirals through the air, crashing into the wall, THUDDING to the floor.  As Doom stalks closer, Sue gathers her strength to...GO INVISIBLE.

segments.content: A hanging beat.  We see: a FAINT OUTLINE of Sue behind him.

dialogue.text: A hanging beat.  We see: a FAINT OUTLINE of Sue behind him.

segments.content: He SPINS, GRABS her!  Doom grips her neck, SLAMMING her to the ground beside Reed.  She lays there, beaten, visible. In the distance behind Doom, city lights BLINK, fading in and out.  Lights flutter softly here (like when Ben went through the machine).  Reed looks up.  Could it be...? EXT. EAST RIVER - NIGHT Johnny jets over the water with the missile only twenty feet behind him.  He's running out of options, when he spots: A GARBAGE BARGE floating in the water ahead.  Thinking fast, Johnny does a fly-by and HURLS a fireball at the barge. VWOOSH!  The flames ignite and spread quickly. He loops back toward the flaming barge as the missile closes in on him.  Fifteen feet...ten... Just as it's about to hit -- JOHNNY FLAMES OFF and falls toward the water.  As he tumbles through the air, we CUT BACK TO -- INT. VON DOOM CONFERENCE ROOM - NIGHT From their vantage point, they see the missile explode. Flames dance. Sue's eyes darken, as Doom grips her neck. Reed tries desperately to move, but he is FROZEN.  It takes every last ounce of strength to lift one finger, which makes a CRACCCKKKKING sound.

dialogue.text: He SPINS, GRABS her!  Doom grips her neck, SLAMMING her to the ground beside Reed.  She lays there, beaten, visible. In the distance behind Doom, city lights BLINK, fading in and out. It takes every last ounce of strength to lift one finger, which makes a CRACCCKKKKING sound.

segments.content: One more down.  Now it's just the
scientist and his specimen.
Sue and Reed lock eyes.  Reed tries to move his mouth.  He
has something to tell her, struggling just to move his lips
and get the words out.
Sue.  The only thing I ever knew
without thinking was...
(his lips fully freezing)
He starts to say "you," but his lips FREEZE, mid-word.  Sue whispers to him:

dialogue.text: He starts to say "you," but his lips FREEZE, mid-word.  Sue whispers to him:

segments.content: Doom steps toward Sue, about to deliver the final blow.

dialogue.text: Doom steps toward Sue, about to deliver the final blow.

segments.content: (quiet, cruel)
And so four became none.  It's my time
now.
BOOOOM!  An elevator DOOR FLIES INTO THE ROOM!  SMASH!
Reed recognizes the voice.  So do we.  Doom turns to see... BEN GRIMM, AKA THE THING.  Back in rocky, fighting form.

dialogue.text: Reed recognizes the voice.  So do we.  Doom turns to see... BEN GRIMM, AKA THE THING.  Back in rocky, fighting form.

segments.content:
Doom turns, just as --

               BAM!  Ben HITS Doom harder than any living thing has ever

               been hit.  The force sends Doom back through the air, toward

               the far wall, where he SMASHES into the massive "V"

               sculpture.  It SNAPS, crashing onto him.  A few sparks.  Then

               nothing.

               Nothing at all.  No more movement.  Doom is dead.

               Ben turns to Reed.
Reed manages the thinnest smile as Ben starts disconnecting the tubes from Reed.

character.name: Damn, I've been wanting to do that.

dialogue.text: Reed manages the thinnest smile as Ben starts disconnecting the tubes from Reed.

segments.content: (Reed's words)
Victor's "not that bad," huh?  Just "a
little larger than life"?  Maybe
you'll listen to me next time before --
WHMM!  The WRECKAGE shifts.  They turn to see...Doom EMERGES.
He stands, power coursing.  And he CHARGES at Ben!  Ben
charges back.  And these two behemoths...

heading.subject: SLAM INTO EACH OTHER, CRASHING THROUGH GLASS, INTO THIN AIR!!
heading.raw_text: SLAM INTO EACH OTHER, CRASHING THROUGH GLASS, INTO THIN AIR!!

segments.content:
Doom and Ben PLUMMET, wrestling in mid-air.  On the ground,

               PEOPLE scream and duck for cover.  Doom and Ben SMASH through

               the large GLASS roof of a lower building across the street.

BOOOOM!  Doom and Ben, locked in combat, drop through the

               glass, landing in a large HOTEL POOL.  People scream, run.

UNDERWATER: Doom and Ben LAND HARD.  Their combined weight

               CRACKS the floor of the pool.  A YOUNG BOY watches underwater

               through his MASK.  Doom and Ben square off, but...

               The CRACKS OPEN WIDER!  And they're PULLED toward the HOLE! 

               WHOOSH!  The water is all sucked out of the hole.  The boy

               holds tight to a ladder, as Ben and Doom crash down to --

A HOTEL GUEST sees water FLOOD into the hall.  Roaring rapids

               head straight for him.  He jams his key into the lock,

               turning desperately, just barely leaping out of the way as

               the wave carrying BEN and DOOM SMASHES through a window to --
SMASH!  Ben and Doom fly out the window, thrashing in the

heading.raw_text: EXT. NEW YORK CITY STREET - CONTINUOUS

segments.content:
CRASH!  Water floods the street.  Doom and Ben land in a

               large GARBAGE TRUCK.  The truck rocks back and forth, DENTING

               from the inside.  Grunts, growls.

               CRASH!  The truck suddenly STOPS.  COP CARS SPEED CLOSER,

               sirens screaming.  And --

               BOOM, A HUGE SHAPE explodes from the truck.  SMASH!  Ben

               lands on a CAR filled with two OLD LADIES -- his head cracks

               the WINDSHIELD.  Doom steps out of the garbage truck, water

               flooding the street around him.  COP CARS converge on Doom. 

               Doom turns his attention to the cops.  His limbs SPARK with

               electricity, ready to fire at the cars.

Ben sees the cops and Doom.  He knows the cops are dead meat. 

               He turns to the OLD LADY in the driver's seat.
Excuse me, Maam.  Can I borrow your
car?
She nods and quickly gets out, shaking.
The clutch sticks a little.

Ben LIFTS the car and THROWS it at Doom.  WHMM!  It FLIES through the air, and WHAM!  Hits hard, knocking Doom back twenty feet!  As Doom FLIES back, a BUS enters frame, and -- EXT. NEW YORK CITY STREET - NIGHT BOOM!  Doom SMASHES into the OUT OF SERVICE BUS!  CRASH! Windows shatter.  The bus SLAMS into an ELECTRICITY POLE, snapping the pole.  Doom steps out, unharmed. Ben CHARGES toward him.  Doom grabs the broken ELECTRICITY POLE, FLIPS it into his hand, and wields the pole like a giant STUN-GUN!  Electric sparks FLY through the air into -- BEN!  The BLAST of VOLTS launches him off his feet!  He goes FLYING backward, ELECTROCUTED in mid-flight, and -- WHOOMPF!  Ben LANDS HARD, face down, CRATERING the street! Water rushes into the crater.  Ben lays there, incapacitated. EXT. NEW YORK CITY STREET - SAME TIME On the street, cars SCREAM to stops, people GASP.  Doom strides up to Ben, and raises the ELECTRICITY POLE for the death-blow.  Currents surge.  Right before he swings down --

segments.content: Simple, strong.  Doom turns to see...REED.  Alone.  Bruised and battered.  Slowly stepping toward him.  Doom smiles.

character.name: I can't let you do that.

dialogue.text: Simple, strong.  Doom turns to see...REED.  Alone.  Bruised and battered.  Slowly stepping toward him.  Doom smiles.

segments.content: He turns back to Ben, raises the pole, but...he CAN'T SWING DOWN!  Something is HOLDING the pole in mid-air. Something invisible.

dialogue.text: He turns back to Ben, raises the pole, but...he CAN'T SWING DOWN!  Something is HOLDING the pole in mid-air. Something invisible.

segments.content: She turns VISIBLE, holding back the pole with a FORCEFIELD. Using her power, she FLINGS the pole from Doom's grip.  It skids along the street.  Reed helps Ben to his feet. Doom turns to these three wounded soldiers.

dialogue.text: She turns VISIBLE, holding back the pole with a FORCEFIELD. Using her power, she FLINGS the pole from Doom's grip.  It skids along the street.  Reed helps Ben to his feet. Doom turns to these three wounded soldiers.

segments.content: Doom steps toward them, but --

character.name: What is this?  The pitiful three?

dialogue.text: Doom steps toward them, but --

segments.content: WHOOOSH!  Johnny SWOOPS DOWN, hurling a FIREBALL like a flamethrower, KNOCKING Doom back. Johnny takes his place alongside the others.  The four of them stand as one.  Johnny turns to Thing.

dialogue.text: WHOOOSH!  Johnny SWOOPS DOWN, hurling a FIREBALL like a flamethrower, KNOCKING Doom back. Johnny takes his place alongside the others.  The four of them stand as one.  Johnny turns to Thing.

segments.content: Thing starts to retort, but Johnny gives a warm smile.

dialogue.text: Thing starts to retort, but Johnny gives a warm smile.

segments.content: They turn to Doom, who stands with metal skin slightly singed and melted, making him look all the more menacing.

dialogue.text: They turn to Doom, who stands with metal skin slightly singed and melted, making him look all the more menacing.

segments.content: Electricity starts to course through his body.  He stands at the foot of the crater Ben made.  He THRUSTS down, grabbing a thick POWER CABLE, RIPPING it out of the street! He SNAPS the cable into two snaking, lashing strips.  He holds tight, ABSORBING the power.  Lights FLICKER and DIM in buildings around him.  Windows BLOW!  Doom GLOWS, amped up. He LETS GO of the cables!  The two deadly wires SNAKE out of control!  PEDESTRIANS scatter, panic.  Reed sees the wires SLASHING through the air.  He makes a move: Reed STREEETCHES HIS ARMS, reaching for the deadly cables. Doom FIRES superpowered ENERGY BOLTS.  The electric charges surge through the air toward the Fantastic Four, but -- Sue TOSSES her FORCE-FIELDS, exploding Doom's blasts in mid- flight.  She keeps her hands up, BLOCKING blows like a prize fighter.  One of Doom's BOLTS glances off her force-field and -- SMASHES into a concrete stanchion of a BUILDING!  The pillar starts to crumble, with PEOPLE huddled under the overhang! They're about to be CRUSHED by the falling concrete!  But -- Suddenly, the concrete roof HOLDS STEADY...because...BEN is holding it up!  He stands beside the stanchion, like Atlas holding the world.  People run out, safe. ON THE STREET: Reed finally grabs both ends of the wire.

character.name: This is going to be fun.

segments.content:
Johnny FLIES toward him, and uses his flames to WELD the

               wires back together.  Sparks fly.  The cables start to FUSE. 

               Doom keeps FIRING.  Sue struggles with her force-fields.  The

               impact is too much.  Her nose starts to bleed.

Doom smiles.  Reed sees her.  She is about to drop her hands, vulnerable, but..............REED STRETCHES HIS WHOLE BODY! He EXPANDS himself across the street, and GRABS a TREE, so he forms a WALL between Sue and Doom. Doom keeps FIRING his bolts.  They SLAM into Reed's body, RUBBERBAND his skin, and DISTEND OUT his back without breaking.  He strains, agonizing.

They SLAM into Reed's body, RUBBERBAND his skin, and DISTEND OUT his back without breaking.  He strains, agonizing.

segments.content: Johnny.  SUPERNOVA.
But all these people...
Johnny charges toward Doom -- flames on his body starting build to a blinding white intensity, ENGULFING everything. Johnny GRABS DOOM.

dialogue.text: Johnny charges toward Doom -- flames on his body starting build to a blinding white intensity, ENGULFING everything. Johnny GRABS DOOM.

segments.content: (quiet, smiling)
FLASH!  Johnny explodes in a PULSE of BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT, which starts to HEAT UP everything surrounding it.  Reed doesn't miss a beat.  He's in total command now.

dialogue.text: FLASH!  Johnny explodes in a PULSE of BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT, which starts to HEAT UP everything surrounding it.  Reed doesn't miss a beat.  He's in total command now.

segments.content: Sue, I need some of that anger, rage,
frustration --
(looking at Doom)

She concentrates.  She sees Johnny holding onto Doom -- and the GROWING HEAT and LIGHT. Sue shuts her eyes.  A GIANT FORCE FIELD EXPLODES FROM HER BODY.  A massive WAVE OF ENERGY.  It SWOOPS past a car, which WARPS, MELTS (half the car is not inside the force-field). Thing turns to the crowd, extending his arm, blocking them. Sue's force-field ENVELOPS JOHNNY'S SUPERNOVA, containing it in a BRIGHT SPHERE OF ENERGY.  The light increases, to the point that it's blinding.  People look away. Finally, Johnny's supernova fades.  He collapses to the ground, exhausted, smoking.  Sue exhales and falls to her knees.  Her force field fades.  The light flickers out.  As everyone's eyes adjust, we hear...THUD.  THUD.  And -- DOOM steps through the smoke.  Unharmed.  His metallic body GLOWS WHITE, TRAILING MOLTEN METAL.  Sue, Ben, Johnny look devastated.  They can't beat him.  He looks at Reed.

character.name: I'm sure I can come up with something.

They can't beat him.  He looks at Reed.

segments.content: Is that the best you can do...?  A
little heat...?
Reed stays perfectly calm.  He shakes his head.
what happens when you supercool hot
metal...?
(to Ben)
Ben...

He KICKS OPEN the FIRE HYDRANT.  The water GEYSERS UP!  Ben kicks down with his foot, deflecting the water so it sprays toward Reed, who...TWISTS HIS TORSO so... The water CURLS around his chest, RACES down his arms, and SHOOTS right off his wrists toward Doom!

dialogue.text: He KICKS OPEN the FIRE HYDRANT.  The water GEYSERS UP!  Ben kicks down with his foot, deflecting the water so it sprays toward Reed, who...TWISTS HIS TORSO so... The water CURLS around his chest, RACES down his arms, and SHOOTS right off his wrists toward Doom!

segments.content: Doom RUSHES TOWARD Reed, but the WATER FLIES OUT, DOUSING DOOM.  GIANT CLOUDS OF STEAM fill the air from the cooling metal.  DOOM screams.  His shrieks finally fade to SILENCE. The water stops, thick steam clouds roll, completely obscuring Doom from view.  A beat.  The steam clears to reveal: DOOM.  A true statue now -- a hard, cold solid piece of METAL.  Frozen forever.  Reed, Sue, Ben, and Johnny -- The Fantastic Four -- exhale.  They stand as one, in roiling smoke.  A beat.

segments.content: Reed and Sue slowly lock eyes, thinking the same thing.

dialogue.text: Reed and Sue slowly lock eyes, thinking the same thing.

segments.content: Will they accept their mantle?  Reed shrugs.

dialogue.text: Will they accept their mantle?  Reed shrugs.

segments.content: They give weary smiles.  A team.  Sue gets close to Reed.

character.name: Well, we do have the suits...

segments.content: You know, about what we said up there,
THHM!  He KISSES HER.  His neck extending.  Strong, powerful. He pulls back slightly, smiles at her.  A new strength in him.

dialogue.text: THHM!  He KISSES HER.  His neck extending.  Strong, powerful. He pulls back slightly, smiles at her.  A new strength in him.

segments.content: Sue looks at Reed.  A long way from that conference room.

character.name: Funny how things turn out, isn't it?

dialogue.text: Sue looks at Reed.  A long way from that conference room.

segments.content: As they kiss, people emerge, stepping out of hiding.  The sun rises around them.  The Fantastic Four step into the new dawn of a new day.  And we slowly DISSOLVE TO -- INT. CIRCLE LINE BOAT - BANQUET ROOM - DUSK Reed and Sue kiss on the deck of the Circle Line as it chugs around New York City.

segments.content: A PARTY IN PROGRESS.  Drinks, food, music.  We see in the crowd a familiar faces: O'HOOLIHAN (cast on his arm), bartender ERNIE, others.  JOHNNY and BEN stand behind Reed and Sue. Reed and Sue pull apart.  Reed turns to Ben, excited.

segments.content: Ben, I've been crunching the numbers
on the machine.  I think if we can
rework the power settings...
Forget it, egghead.  I'm good as is.
She hands Ben a big METAL MUG.  Ben takes the mug.  He CLINKS, but SHATTERS her glass.

dialogue.text: She hands Ben a big METAL MUG.  Ben takes the mug.  He CLINKS, but SHATTERS her glass.

segments.content: We're going to have to work on your
touch.
Alicia gets close.  A soft smile.  Reed turns to Sue.

character.name: I like the sound of that.

dialogue.text: Alicia gets close.  A soft smile.  Reed turns to Sue.

segments.content: Reed leads her out.  Ben and Johnny swap a glance. EXT. CIRCLE LINE BOAT - DECK - DUSK A romantic view of the city-scape.  Reed stands with Sue.

character.name: Sue, can I talk to you for a second?

dialogue.text: Reed leads her out.  Ben and Johnny swap a glance. EXT. CIRCLE LINE BOAT - DECK - DUSK A romantic view of the city-scape.  Reed stands with Sue.

segments.content: I found a broken gasket, from space --
He opens his hand, revealing a circular piece of metal, just about the size of......a RING.  Sue slows down.

character.name: A gasket?  Reed, we're at a party.

dialogue.text: He opens his hand, revealing a circular piece of metal, just about the size of......a RING.  Sue slows down.

segments.content: She sees Johnny and Ben inside, watching -- in on a secret. Reed looks her square in the eye.  Unflinching.

character.name: If one of us were to wear it...

dialogue.text: She sees Johnny and Ben inside, watching -- in on a secret. Reed looks her square in the eye.  Unflinching.

segments.content: Reed drops to his knees.  His head stays eye-level, while his body drops.  Sue gapes, so emotional she starts to DISAPPEAR.

dialogue.text: Reed drops to his knees.  His head stays eye-level, while his body drops.  Sue gapes, so emotional she starts to DISAPPEAR.

segments.content: No more thinking, no more variables...
Sue Storm...will you...
(she's gone)
Dead silence.  And then... THE RING DISAPPEARS.  SUE IS WEARING IT.

dialogue.text: Dead silence.  And then... THE RING DISAPPEARS.  SUE IS WEARING IT.

segments.content: Reed goes to kiss her.

dialogue.text: Reed goes to kiss her.

segments.content: That's my nose, genius... These are my
lips.
Reed's face is SQUEEZED on both sides by Sue's invisible
hands.  She pulls him into a KISS and reappears.
INSIDE: the party applauds.  Ben, Johnny, and Alicia move
through the crowd to join Reed and Sue.  As they go --
No more cracks about how I look.
Hey, I'm Mr. Sensitivity now.
(weaving around bodies)
Clear the way, wide load coming
through.
Ben glares, fists clenched.  Johnny smiles, mischievous, as
they hit the balcony.  And he FLAMES ON, taking off into the
air, blazing the NUMBER "FOUR" enclosed in a circle of flame
(their future callsign), over the city skyline.  The crowd
oohs and aahs.  Ben watches, unimpressed.

People drink, laugh, dance.  We slowly PULL BACK from the party, the boat, the city, and...CUT TO -- EXT. HARBOR - DAY CLOSE ON: the MELTED FACE of DOOM.  He is placed in a wooden crate.  LEONARD oversees the operation, listening to his cell. As two workers move the heavy door in place -- a crackle of ELECTRICITY moves over Doom's body.  Leonard's CELLPHONE goes STATICKY.  His eyes narrow.  Could it be...?  And -- SLAM.  The door closes.  We can read the destination through stenciled lettering: LATVERIA.
